results.title: The Goal
results.brief_description: Meet Bella, a soccer obsessed ten year old. She eats, breathes and dreams soccer. There’s just one problem. She would rather eat junk food while watching a match on TV than actually play the game herself. When a freak accident occurs, everyone mistakes her for a soccer superstar. However, due to her lack of soccer skills she fails miserably. Will she change her attitude towards exercise or remain a couch potato forever?

results.title: KnightGame
results.creator_credit: Angus Latham, Belmont High School, Ewan Breakey and Logan Bryce
results.brief_description: ‘KnightGame’ is a Medieval local multiplayer battle arena, where any stab, shield or shot could be your last. Purchase items at your base to change, strengthen and morph you and your army into fearsome warriors, then march into battle and destroy your opponent’s base to claim victory. But be wary, not all items are created equal and many will hinder you.

results.title: The Good, the bad and the noodley
results.brief_description: Business is booming for Ninja Noodle which means business is bad for The Grubby Gruel. After the noodle shop is raided by the town bad apple, the good Shinobi must battle against the odds to return his secret sauce to its rightful place. East meets west in a noodle-filled western caper.

results.title: My Brother's Bedroom
results.brief_description: A winner in the Junior Animation category for Screen It 2016. My brother’s bedroom door was always closed. I was never allowed into his bedroom. What was the mystery? I couldn’t stand it any longer and had to risk everything to have a look at what was behind his bedroom door.

results.title: The Genie
results.brief_description: A Special Mention in the Junior Live Action category of Screen It 2016. A young boy discovers a book on how to be a genie. Will he use his new powers for good or evil?

results.title: Extrasensory Perception
results.creator_credit: St Mary's Anglican Girls' College and Tallulah Chong
results.brief_description: Winner in the Senior Live Action category. Extrasensory Perception is a film which takes audiences on an emotional journey of confusion, suspense and realization. It is a complex narrative featuring an engaging crime and characters bearing supernatural powers…

results.title: The Mysterious Mister E
results.creator_credit: Mansfield State High School and Tom Barham
results.brief_description: Winner in the Senior Animation category. Mister E is an enigmatic vigilante courier delivering packages that need to be hidden from an oppressive government, who monitor everything. But what will happen when the government catches on to Mister E’s mischievous movements? And what tricks does Mister E have up his sleeve to evade them?

results.title: Mots' Mansion [videogame trailer]
results.brief_description: Special Mention in the Middle Videogame category. Sam, Bec and their Mother move in to Grandma’s house. But when Bec is captured, Sam needs to complete tasks given to him by the mysterious MOTS. Can he trust the Man on the Stairs and will they both make it out. In the end, the choices you make will matter.
